settings.name: protoName
settings.description: The name of the proto file

settings.name: serviceName
settings.description: The name of the service mentioned in proto file

settings.name: enableTLS
settings.description: true - To enable TLS (Transport Layer Security), false - No TLS security

settings.name: serverCert
settings.description: Server certificate file in PEM format. Need to provide file name along with path. Path can be relative to gateway binary location.

settings.name: serverKey
settings.description: Server private key file in PEM format. Need to provide file name along with path. Path can be relative to gateway binary location.
